name: details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool price_comparison.
Tool description: Amazon, Ebay, Target, Walmart, Google - price & product data from all marketplaces via one API. The Price Comparison API provides price & product data incl. product title, manufacturer, sellers, reviews, prices, size selection etc.
API description: Fetch product details from the price comparison API using various geographical and identification parameters.

is_id.description: The identifier for the product. This can be a UPC, EAN, ISBN, GTIN, or Amazon ASIN.

country.description: The country code for the query. Default is 'US'.

longitude.description: The longitude for geographical querying. Default is '-122.49493'.

latitude.description: The latitude for geographical querying. Default is '37.777805'.
